channel.title: Pur3 pk ftw client v1 and server v1
channel.description:
after a few months or so i decided to move on from k0ed u and made a new client called pur3 pk ftw. it was quite fun to make this and the only reason i got into clients again was because of chosen angels (aka braiton). so thanks to him for inspiring me into getting back into making clients.
here are the features. Jframe and Jmenu for those of you who like clients with this in. server ip and port changer in the Jframe. a theme selector in the Jframe. loads of custom items in the client. most silab items added into the client, some that i couldnt get. music in the client. the client has 2 run things. high detail, runs the client with Jframe. Low detail, Runs the client without Jframe. the client does not auto connect to any server. the client has an add models button for those of you who are too lazy to keep typing add model (model number) in all the time. the client includes an item list, npc list, object list, silab item list, and a custom item list which currently has nothing in it. just add the item names and ids for your custom items into there.
now for the pictures.
[IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/clientreleasepic.jpg[/img] that is some of the custom items you will find in the client.
[IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/clientreleasepic2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/clientreleasepic3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/clientreleasepic4.jpg[/img] my fave pic of the client, the background, FTW.
and finally the virus scan
[IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/virusscanforpur3pkftwclient.jpg[/img]
now for the download links.
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?toeuyntu2dd http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?toeuyntu2dd http://www.megaupload.com/?d=QCQSIT6X http://www.megaupload.com/?d=QCQSIT6X
now for the credits
[size=28pt]credits to sir roju/fubergen for the codes for the themes changer. credits to chosen angels (aka braiton) for the client base. credits to me for editing the client and adding in custom items and MOST silab items, adding in the themes selector.[/size]
i hope you all enjoy this client. please post positive feedback and things i can do to improve the client. thank you for your time.
now for the server, as i was just told i don't need 2 topics for my releases.
well guys, as i have recently released my client, i have decided to release my server source, some of you may like it, others wont, so here goes, this is my first server release so dont flame or say i leached, i used the chosen angels server source v1 as my server base. so i hope you enjoy this.
now the server features: fully working ip ban loads of pk areas quite a few minigames custom commands like ::sgs ::zgs ::bgs ::ags ::gswords great economy and loads more things that i cant think of
some of the commands are [code]player commands: starter modinfo rules guthtrain (made by me) barrows slayer kq jad pkbox teampk mining skills train shops edge pk and many more [/code]
[code]mod commands: master pure staffzone dh alert pnpc jail unjail mute unmute rares white boom xrichie [/code]
[code]admin commands: pkarm vengeance rspk adminwear gay say setsay admingear adminglow adminglowoff [/code]
[code]owner commands: all of the above givemod giveadmin giveowner dharokpk ownerglow ownerglowoff richgs gspking best lava and many more [/code]
now for the pictures [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0002.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0003.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0004.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0005.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0006.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0007.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0008.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0009.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0010.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0011.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0013.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0016.png[/img] [IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/evolved0019.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i432.photobucket.com/albums/qq41/k0edu/virusscanforpur3pkftwclient.jpg[/img]
and now for the download links. [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?fdym2kmnyzi]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?fdym2kmnyzi[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?fdym2kmnyzi]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?fdym2kmnyzi[/url] [url=http://www.uppit.com/B8R1UZ]http://www.uppit.com/B8R1UZ[/url] [url=http://www.uppit.com/B8R1UZ]http://www.uppit.com/B8R1UZ[/url]
CREDITS TO CHOSEN ANGELS FOR THE BASE I USED CREDITS TO ME FOR EDITING AND ADDING IN THINGS CREDITS TO FIGMENT FOR PASSWORDS IN QUEST TAB

not bad (on the skilling area is ftw with the map its big black square. Anyway don’t create areas with no map, fully render it then relase a place)

yeah i know, ill try more for my next release.
[/quote]

Great wanne start project together?[/quote]
